  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112429</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112429</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Zdrave navade, razvade</string>
            <string language="en">Healthy and bad habits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesunde und falsche Gewohnheiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Habitudes saines et mauvaises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hábitos saudáveis e maus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abitudini sane e difettose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υγιείς και κακές συνήθειες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hábitos sanos y malos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Spoznavanje zdravih navad in razvad (zdrava prehrana, kajenje, ...) in mozne oblike poučevanja in delavnic na to temo.</string>
            <string language="en">How to present healthy and bad habits (healthy foods and nutrition, smoking, ...). Possible games and activities to make subject more attractive.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">navada</string>
            <string language="en">habit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razvada</string>
            <string language="en">bad habit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prehrana</string>
            <string language="en">nutrition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kajenje</string>
            <string language="en">smoking</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man die gesunden und falschen Gewohnheiten 
darstellt (gesunde Nahrungsmittel und Nahrung, rauchend...). 
Mögliche Spiele und Aktivitäten, zum vorbehaltliches 
attraktiveres zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment présenter des habitudes saines et 
mauvaises (nourritures saines et nutrition, fumant...). Jeux 
possibles et activités pour faire plus attrayant soumis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como apresentar hábitos saudáveis e maus 
(alimentos saudáveis e nutrition, fumando...). Jogos possíveis
e atividades para fazer mais atrativo sujeito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come presentare le abitudini sane e difettose 
(alimenti sani e nutrizione, fumanti...). Giochi possibili ed 
attività per fare più attraente tematico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να παρουσιάσει τα υγιείς και κακές πιθανές 
παιχνίδια και τις δραστηριότητες συνηθειών (υγιή τρόφιμα και 
διατροφή, που καπνίζουν...). για να κάνει υπαγόμενο 
ελκυστικότερο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo presentar hábitos sanos y malos (alimentos
sanos y nutrición, fumando...). Juegos posibles y actividades 
para hacer más atractivo sujeto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewohnheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">falsche Gewohnheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rauchen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">habitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mauvaise habitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nutrition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tabagisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hábito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hábito mau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">nutrition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fumar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abitudine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abitudine difettosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nutrizione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fumare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συνήθεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κακή συνήθεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διατροφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κάπνισμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hábito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mal hábito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">nutrición</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el fumar</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
